website_summaries.verdict: A basic kit for a good price. Ships with all components required to start.
pros: WiFi and Bluetooth wireless connectivity options
Ships in either a black or white color scheme
Case is easy to put together via snap system
cons: Doesn't run as fast as some other starter kits

customer_reviews.title: Great Kit - I would suggest getting one with a fan though
customer_reviews.text: i've had a couple issues where my rasberry pi 3 seems to slow down and cache issues when it gets warm. i purchased a fan and customized the case myself. this requires a true 5v power adapter the one that comes with this kit isn't strong enough to do any customization that requires 5v from the pins on motherboard. make sure you know what you are going to do with it before you pull the trigger on this kit. nothing wrong with it just know what you are getting and what you want to do.
customer_reviews.author: Chevydust

customer_reviews.title: Great little computer!
customer_reviews.text: I had never heard of a computer like this, but I was really impressed. It was easy to assemble with great instructions, and worked flawlessly right out of the package. I use this in conjunction with the FlightAware Pro Stick USB ADS-B Receiver to track Aircraft from my residence. I’m thinking of getting another, to get online with Broadcastify.
customer_reviews.author: Renaissance Man

customer_reviews.title: Quality Assurance Needs Improvement
customer_reviews.text: After opening up the product and attempting to set it up, I couldn't get the Raspberry Pi 3 to boot. The red light would remain on, and the activity light was completely off. After 25 minutes of trying to track down the issue, I discovered the SD card it shipped with was bad. That impacted my "customer experience" which is primarily why I gave this 3 stars. I paid the extra money because this came with a pre-configured card and case, however, the pre-configured card that I paid for did not work.
customer_reviews.author: Lewis Beasley

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Kit !!
customer_reviews.text: This kit is very well done ! I had only recently heard about Raspberry Pi and wanted to check it out. So after a few days of investigation I decided to purchase. As you can see I am initially using it to report ADS-B data to several global aircraft flight collating companies. I intend to explore other uses and learn a bit about Linux as well. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: M. Paladino

customer_reviews.title: My Own NAS Server
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for an inexpensive NAS server, and this fit the bill! I had a couple of 1 TB drives that I was no longer using so I added these to the Raspberry Pi and added remote access. It works fine, maybe a little slow, but fine for my needs!
customer_reviews.author: Dave DeCoursey

customer_reviews.title: It's offical
customer_reviews.text: Awesome starter kit for the Raspberry Pi. Everything except the SD card was the official parts branded Element14 (which is currently backordered). The SD card with NOOBS worked perfectly and I was able to progress through setting up a Pi-Hole very easily.
customer_reviews.author: Theo

customer_reviews.title: Everything you need to get started with your RPi
customer_reviews.text: Everything you need to get started with your RPi. You can buy the pieces from various other vendors, and assemble your own kit. But I do not think you will save any money. Also, the power supply works well. I had issues with power supplies from other vendors that did not put out enough power to run the RPi.
customer_reviews.author: H. Zhong

customer_reviews.title: My favorite toy!
customer_reviews.text: The perfect Raspberry Pi to start your journey to the world of hand-crafting. The package contains Raspberry Pi, Case, Adapter and SD card with OS so you can start without any additional efforts. Case has red and white colors. In looks very attractive. Awesome toy! My box was damaged when arrived, but inernals are safe.
customer_reviews.author: Yaroslav Karandashev

customer_reviews.title: A Good Way to Start
customer_reviews.text: Great way to get started quickly. You can research, buy separate parts and download firmware to save a little cost if needed. If you do, pay particular attention to the power supply ratings. (5.1V 2.5A terminated with micro USB) A cheap under powered wall wart may not give reliable results with the Pi 3. Buying this kit at least gives you a reliable baseline for starting up the learning curve.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: Good starter kit!
customer_reviews.text: Had considered setting up a Rasberry Pi to use linux for a while, glad I finally did! This kit has everything you need, I got a screen too so the case was not necessary.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Reliable and great!
customer_reviews.text: This product is a little more expensive than some other packages but in my experience, more reliable. I’ve had 2 bad power supplies from other kits. I used this along with a wireless 8bitdo controller to create a RetroPie setup. Works great!
customer_reviews.author: Mike and Tessa

customer_reviews.title: kids appreciate this gift
customer_reviews.text: purchased for grandson and he is thrilled with it! i find it hard to buy for grandkids as i am often unsure of the technology - so i am thrilled, too
customer_reviews.author: Sandy Fisher

customer_reviews.title: It was a very big disappointment. I recommend reviewing this purchase immediately upon arrival ...
customer_reviews.text: The kit was opened as a christmas gift for my son late. It did not come with the micro sd card with software as shown. It was a very big disappointment. I recommend reviewing this purchase immediately upon arrival to verify that it comes complete. My kit was open after a return was possible.
customer_reviews.author: Ray B

customer_reviews.title: Not a single product
customer_reviews.text: This is perfectly fine, I was just a little surprised that it is 4 separate products in 4 separate boxes. You get the PI board, a case, a power supply, and 16GB memory card (with SD adapter) with NOOBS on it.
customer_reviews.author: Jasmine

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy
customer_reviews.text: Everything went together nicely and i was up with Kodi in no time. It all just works which is amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Steven

customer_reviews.title: I love my Raspberry Pi
customer_reviews.text: Everything works as advertised. I love my Raspberry Pi; however, there were no heat sinks in this kit. That could cause some problems if you are trying to do most things. You could burn out the Pi without one. So sadly I will have to buy additional heat sinks, but still a great price for almost everything you could need.
customer_reviews.author: Kain Gerena

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality, As Advertised
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this kit to run flight tracking software. Arrived quickly, assembled easily, no issues. Nifty little device!
customer_reviews.author: B. Davis

customer_reviews.title: The official Pi!
customer_reviews.text: At last a Pi kit with the official accessories! The case allows you to easily access the connections without needing to dismantle it.
customer_reviews.author: EricTRed

customer_reviews.title: Feeling like a kid again
customer_reviews.text: As a computer, this isn’t the fastest or most powerful. However, the easy to install OS and the GPIO make this device a fun toy to learn code and practice controlling inputs and outputs. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Fede

customer_reviews.title: great set
customer_reviews.text: Raspberry pi 3 complete....great price...just add a HDMI cable and go. International power supply too. Great for traveling with my portable Pi projects.
customer_reviews.author: NorCal man

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good kit for a good price. Came with everything I needed to get started sans video cable.
customer_reviews.author: Lance

customer_reviews.title: much smaller than I expected
customer_reviews.text: Way more powerful than I thought. These are very fun little machines. :)
customer_reviews.author: Keith Bare

customer_reviews.title: Great, new ARM single-board computer
customer_reviews.text: Great, new ARM single-board computer. This kit contains everything you'll need to get started with Raspberry Pi except for the basic requirements (wall outlet to plug it in, a monitor/TV, HDMI cable, USB keyboard). The Cortex-53 processor is nice and fast. The case looks solid and it protects the Raspberry Pi from the environment. Overall, this is a great buy.
customer_reviews.author: David Moberg

customer_reviews.title: great starter kit.
customer_reviews.text: Really cool starter kit. Still wish some kits had a power button on the USB adapter. Make it much easier to cycle.
customer_reviews.author: tb929

customer_reviews.title: It works and is easy to put together.
customer_reviews.text: Easy peasy to put together -- just drop items in and snap them together. No screws. No fuss. Am running Pi-Hole on it.
customer_reviews.author: Raj S

customer_reviews.title: Easy Setup
customer_reviews.text: Love it. works great. easy setup and youtube is your friend if you plan to use it for retro video games.
customer_reviews.author: Jay556.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for offloading a few minor services to!
customer_reviews.text: Pi-hole, UniFi controller, Homebridge all running on this little guy. Simple to assemble and install.
customer_reviews.author: John C. Overcash

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Very easy and intuitive, even for an amateur. Made mine into a personal cloud server.
customer_reviews.author: ryanas88

customer_reviews.title: Seems to be working great,
customer_reviews.text: Bought to use for pi-hole. Seems to be working great, way
customer_reviews.author: Adam

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Made this into a Pi-Hole device for ad blocking, works phenomenally.
customer_reviews.author: Pete

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Came on time and with everything as described. Purchased for a family member as a Christmas gift.
customer_reviews.author: Em

customer_reviews.title: It's great fun and pretty darn easy
customer_reviews.text: It's great fun and pretty darn easy. Can't wait to make a Retropie machine. Look for 'hats' at sprakfun or adafruit, and make your pi do ANYTHING.
customer_reviews.author: Social Interactions

customer_reviews.title: Works like a charm
customer_reviews.text: Works well. Just like the pi2b but a little faster. Makes a decent media server or in network web app provider.
customer_reviews.author: bobthebuilder

customer_reviews.title: ... game console out of this little guy and I love it.
customer_reviews.text: Created a game console out of this little guy and I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Frank

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product. I loved it so much I bought ...
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product. I loved it so much I bought 2 of them.
customer_reviews.author: Frank Semeraro

customer_reviews.title: Gift
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for Christmas present hoping to give somebody an opportunity to learn more about computers and programming.
customer_reviews.author: dad

customer_reviews.title: Awesome quality from "Official" Raspberry Pi starter kit
customer_reviews.text: SD Card caused a short. Would not read on PI, Windows, or macbook. Pulled card out of SD reader, literally fell apart into two. Awesome quality from "Official" Raspberry Pi starter kit.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin l

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect! Faster than expected shipping and everything was there. Can't beat the price either.
customer_reviews.author: Chad

customer_reviews.title: This is a great product to get your kids into computing and programming
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product to get your kids into computing and programming, so much scope. The product was as described and delivered in a timely manner.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: 1GB instead of 16GB
customer_reviews.text: Got a 1GB Micro SD card (from 2006!) instead of 16GB. This package is good and other people seem to not have this problem. I am returning and ordering again.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Stewart

customer_reviews.title: Yes i like it very much because i got it on time ...
customer_reviews.text: Yes i like it very much because i got it on time everything was in like they said i haven't installed it yet but im happy.
customer_reviews.author: Henry Delgado

customer_reviews.title: Great kit!
customer_reviews.text: Great kit! The contents are exactly what is described and shown on the images. The fully branded accessories look awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel S.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Everything I needed to get started in the exciting world of Raspberry Pi!
customer_reviews.author: Ken C

customer_reviews.title: Couldn't be more satisfied.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this kit from ALMOST ANYTHING LTD and all four items were exactly as shown in the images. Seller also shipped very quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: looks nice, arrived quickly
customer_reviews.text: received it today. Looks great, arrived quickly, Ill update the review when I get time to play...
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Mismatched parts
customer_reviews.text: Case was neat, the Pi itself was fine. But they included a standard sd card while the Pi only had a micro sd slot. Would be cheaper to buy the pi, case and the correct card seperately
customer_reviews.author: Alan Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: Works exactly as expected
customer_reviews.text: Really not much to say, it Just Works right out the box.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: SD Card Not Pre-Loaded with OS
customer_reviews.text: The reason I bought the kit was because the SD card was supposed to come preloaded with Rasbian, it didn't.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Birthday present
customer_reviews.text: Great little kit. Bought as a Birthday present. Ideal for a beginner - simple and straightforward.
customer_reviews.author: J. Grieco

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I got the gift for my boyfriend and he loves.
customer_reviews.author: Carolina

customer_reviews.title: Excelent product
customer_reviews.text: Excelent product. The raspberry pi 3 its really powerfull. The only thing I complain its about the poor packaging of the product. The rest its ok
customer_reviews.author: Diego

customer_reviews.title: I like this product
customer_reviews.text: I like this product, the only issue was with rhe SD Card, it did not work. I had to buy anothe one locally.
customer_reviews.author: Aroldo P Carvalho

customer_reviews.title: works fine out of the box
customer_reviews.text: Was exactly what I was expecting, works fine out of the box, now to start playing around!
customer_reviews.author: TheEllimist

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Our Son in law loved his gift! Great help as an IT!!
customer_reviews.author: Jen Richardson

customer_reviews.title: I like this kit more than my previous pi purchases since ...
customer_reviews.text: I like this kit more than my previous pi purchases since it's an all in bundle. It took away the hastle of having to figure out which card, case, and power supply. The case doesn't utilize any screws so it is very easy to install the pi without needing tools.
customer_reviews.author: Koschack

customer_reviews.title: Cheap and user friendly
customer_reviews.text: Need a cheap easy computer for just day to day tasks. The pi is the way
customer_reviews.author: Belle

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I needed. Just plug in the sd card. Power it up and your on your way
customer_reviews.author: William Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: Excellent starter kit
customer_reviews.text: Not quite all you need--grab a keyboard, mouse and HDMI cable. We plugged ours into the LG TV we were using with our Mac Mini. I just handed the box to my 13 y/o and he disappeared into my office and figured it out on his own. This one has the preloaded SD card so you don't have to program anything to get started.
customer_reviews.author: Blondegirlfrnd

customer_reviews.title: Everything works as advertised, however, most important part ...
customer_reviews.text: Everything works as advertised, however, most important part to protect the CPU ( heat sink) was missing in this kit.
customer_reviews.author: PaulD

customer_reviews.title: Works but not satisfied..
customer_reviews.text: The micro sd card is different from what it looks like in the picture. There was not package for the sd card, only a plastic bag. I doubt whether it is used or new... There are scratches on the raspberry pi board as well. The raspberry pi itself works fine by far.
customer_reviews.author: Young

customer_reviews.title: SD data came corrupted
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a gift for my nephew who is interested in coding but the data on the SD card came corrupted. I know that it's very easy to download NOOBS and reinstall but when you're buying a kit that claims to come with everything needed to get started you shouldn't have to. I'm returning it.
customer_reviews.author: Josh E

customer_reviews.title: Easy to set up - watch videos
customer_reviews.text: My son is a huge fan of this. Felt like he was able to investigate, and set up on his own. He watched a ton of videos before he got it which helped. Currently we aren’t using it because we are convinced it’s interfearing with our WiFi connected devices but can’t be 100% sure. Hoping it resolves itself.
customer_reviews.author: BecsTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Great for self-motivated learners
customer_reviews.text: My son, 12 yrs old, got this for Christmas and he loves it. He has already figured out different programs for the device and is now looking at game-coding. This is probably not a great gift for people who are not self-motivated DIYers willing to research and spend some time figuring things out.
customer_reviews.author: LadyFuries

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: worked out of the box, now serving up FlightAware ADS-B streams
customer_reviews.author: B. Tucker

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install and easy to use. Now I need to learn more about the SO
customer_reviews.author: Jesus Hernandez Agustín

product_meta.title: Raspberry Pi 3 Desktop Starter Kit (Black)
product_meta.description: Color:BlackThe Raspberry Pi 3 Model B Official Desktop Starter Kit is great fun for both beginners and experienced coders. It's fully branded with the famous Raspberry Pi Logo featured on all the accessories including the Case, Power Supply and SD Card. The kit comes with the latest Raspberry Pi board (The Raspberry Pi 3 Model B) as well as the official 16GB SD Card with the Pre-installed with Raspbian and NOOBS operating system. The cool black color and the full branding with the famous Raspberry Pi logo looks great.
feature_bullets: The Raspberry Pi 3 Model B builds upon the features of its predecessors with a new, faster processor on board to increase its speed. It also features WiFi and Bluetooth Low Energy capabilities to enhance the functionality and the ability to power more powerful devices over the USB ports.
16GB Class 10 MicroSD (Pre-installed with Raspbian OS and NOOBS installer)
Official Black Raspberry Pi 3 HAT compatible Case - Easy snap fit assembly
Official Black Raspberry Pi 5.1V 2.5A Power Supply (UK, EU, USA & Australia)

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars1,304 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
